page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN MOELFRE 1
page.content: {Statistics based on information about {employment of parents of children of {junior school age. Number of families {60. } 1. 92% of fathers in employment. 2. 25% of fathers self-employed. 3. 30% of fathers work locally. 4. Main work available locally includes - building trade, farming, shops, garage, restaurant & quarry. 5. 37% of fathers work elsewhere in Anglesey 12% in Amlwch, 8% in Cemaes, 5% in Llangefni, 12% various places. 6. 10% of fathers work outside Wales- oil rigs mainly. 7. 5% fathers unemployed. (continued)
